sentences.en: His only experience of gardening so far proved immensely satisfying.
sentences.cn: 他仅有的园艺经历到目前为止非常令人满意。

sentences.en: We also know that the global climate system is immensely complicated and that everything is in some way connected, and so the system is capable of fluctuating in unexpected ways.
sentences.cn: 我们还知道，全球气候系统极其复杂，一切都以某种方式联系在一起，因此，这个系统能够以意想不到的方式波动。
